metadata.name: Resilient
metadata.description:
Can you See and Feel her,

 As nothing can stop her,

Standing tall, still and bold

Cos she is carrying a bird of Hope,

       she is Resilient.

Woman here is abstract visual of self portrait, holding a nest in hair (my original hair) with the new born dove in it which represents Hope philosophically and trying to move forward no matter what and how badly hurt or injured but that bird of hope is keeping her alive and her inspiration as well.



Artwork Details : 6000X8000
Medium : original hair of myself, Watercolour, Rubber,  golden nails and procreate
